summary: The “Preventing Risky Operations from Threatening the Education and Career Trajectories of Students Act of 2025” (PROTECT Students Act) aims to increase accountability in higher education. Key provisions include measures for gainful employment, borrower defense, closed school discharges, and prohibiting limitations on student legal action. The bill also addresses oversight of third-party servicers, job placement rates, the allocation of tuition revenue, and past performance of institutions. Furthermore, it strengthens enforcement, establishes a complaint tracking system, and improves transparency regarding institutional finances and oversight activities to protect students and taxpayers.
